short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picking and displaying color in a HSL sphere, and relevant information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IroSphereExt is a chromium extension Inspired from IroSphere by タリラボ: https://github.com/TaliPhoto/IroSphereLegacy
It displays color in HSL color sphere, which can be used for color analysis.

Shortcuts：
--Alt+H for hover picker.
--Alt+C for color picker.

https://github.com/Holorei/IroSphereExt
